item.title: 墨西哥财政部长告诉投资者墨西哥能够承受关税影响
item.description: 墨西哥财政部长表示，墨西哥已采取措施保护本国经济免受美国关税的冲击，当局正在共同努力，以防货币市场的流动性受到影响。【原文：Mexico has taken steps to safeguard its economy from the shock of US tariffs and authorities are working together in case liquidity in the currency market is affected, the country’s finance minister said.】

item.title: 美国制造业活动自 2022 年以来首次扩张
item.description: 随着订单增加和生产加快，上个月美国工厂活动自 2022 年以来首次出现扩张，这表明制造业前景更加光明。【原文：US factory activity expanded last month for the first time since 2022 as orders ramped up and production quickened, pointing to a brighter manufacturing outlook.】

item.title: 尽管美国征税，倍耐力仍将坚持减债目标
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，尽管美国关税威胁到这家意大利轮胎制造商的北美业务，但倍耐力公司（Pirelli & C. SpA）预计将坚持今年的减债目标。【原文：Pirelli & C. SpA expects to stick with its debt reduction targets for this year, notwithstanding looming US tariffs that threaten the Italian tire manufacturer’s North American business, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 五角大楼测试办公室称 F-35 生产仍受质量问题困扰
item.description: 根据五角大楼测试办公室的年度武器评估报告，洛克希德-马丁公司（Lockheed Martin Corp.【原文：Lockheed Martin Corp. is still delivering F-35 fighter jet aircraft with quality defects after 13 years of production, according to the Pentagon test office’s annual weapons-evaluations report.】

item.title: 里夫斯向白厅各部门发出 "平现金 "紧缩警告
item.description: 英国财政部已通知多个政府部门，在计划于 6 月进行的重大支出审查之前，做好冻结现金预算的准备。【原文：The UK Treasury has told several government departments to prepare for their budgets to be frozen in cash terms ahead of a major spending review planned in June.】

item.title: Vanguard 的平均费用在经历了有史以来最大的一次下调后，现在仅为 0.07
item.description: 先锋集团（Vanguard Group）削减了旗下数十种共同基金和交易所交易基金的费用，这一创纪录的举措很可能会在资产管理行业掀起轩然大波。【原文：Vanguard Group has slashed the fees for dozens of its mutual funds and ETFs in a record move that’s likely to send a shock wave through the asset management industry.】

item.title: 特朗普要求下调油价，欧佩克+仍坚持供应计划
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普呼吁欧佩克+降低原油价格之际，欧佩克+在周一的审查会议上没有对其现有的石油生产计划做出任何修改。【原文：OPEC+ didn’t make any changes to its existing oil-production plans at a review meeting on Monday, even as President Donald Trump called on the group to lower crude prices.】

item.title: 特朗普加征关税后加拿大股市可能出现调整
item.description: 分析师称，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周六签署行政命令，对从加拿大进口的商品征收关税后，加拿大基准股票指数可能出现大幅回调。【原文：Canada’s benchmark stocks gauge may see a sharp correction after US President Donald Trump signed an executive order imposing tariffs on imports from the country on Saturday, analysts say.】

item.title: Palantir 财报将考验股价反弹后的估值飙升
item.description: 周一收盘后，数据分析软件巨头帕兰提尔科技公司（Palantir Technologies Inc.【原文：Palantir Technologies Inc.’s hefty premium will be in focus when the data analysis software giant reports earnings after the market close on Monday — with the stock trading at levels some see as difficult to maintain.】

item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：BlackRock Inc. is exploring plans to open an office in Kuwait, according to people familiar with the matter, marking the asset manager’s latest effort aimed at deepening ties to the oil-rich region.】

item.title: 微策略公司在十几周后结束比特币购买潮
item.description: 微策略公司（MicroStrategy Inc.【原文：MicroStrategy Inc. said it didn’t buy any Bitcoin in the prior week, halting a string of 12 consecutive weekly purchases that began in late October.】

item.title: 法国社会党领导层不会支持罢免投票：法新社
item.description: 据法新社援引执行委员会会议与会者的话报道，法国社会党领导层决定不支持就今年的预算案对政府提出不信任动议。【原文：The leadership of France’s Socialist Party has decided not to support a no-confidence motion against the government over the budget for this year, according to Agence France-Presse, which cited participants in an executive committee meeting.】

item.title: 对冲基金在特朗普加征关税前撤离美国股市
item.description: 市场上有一个角落对唐纳德-特朗普总统上周的关税威胁非常重视，那就是专业投机者。【原文：There is one nook in the market that took President Donald Trump’s tariff threats seriously last week: professional speculators.】

item.title: 安大略省取消 "星链 "交易，禁止美国公司与政府签订合同
item.description: 安大略省省长表示，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普发布行政命令对从加拿大进口的商品征收关税之后，安大略省政府将终止与埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）控制的卫星公司 Starlink 的合同。【原文：Ontario’s premier said his government is ending its contract with Starlink, the Elon Musk-controlled satellite company, following US President Donald Trump’s executive order to impose tariffs on goods imported from Canada.】

item.title: 特朗普打赌石油供应商的关税之痛将意味着美国的长期收益
item.description:
总统的闪电战将推高油泵价格，威胁全球经济增长。他需要这场赌博得到回报。【原文：

item.title: 据说 Safra Sarasin 正在探讨收购丹麦盛宝银行的交易
item.description: 据知情人士透露，J. Safra Sarasin 银行正在探索收购丹麦盛宝银行（Saxo Bank A/S）的可能性。【原文：Bank J. Safra Sarasin is exploring a potential acquisition of Denmark’s Saxo Bank A/S, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Equirus 和 Credence 合并家族办公室，成立价值 21 亿美元的部门
item.description: 在印度高净值个人对投资产品的需求不断增长的背景下，金融服务公司 Equirus Group 将把其家族办公室业务与 Credence Family Office 合并，成立一家价值 21 亿美元的财富管理公司。【原文：Financial services firm Equirus Group will merge its family office business with Credence Family Office, creating a $2.1 billion wealth management firm amid rising demand for investment products from high net worth individuals in India.】

item.title: 欧元为何再次逼近美元平价
item.description: 自 1999 年欧元问世以来，该货币与美元等值交易的次数屈指可数。上一次是在 2022 年，当时俄罗斯全面入侵乌克兰，引发了欧洲的能源危机，并引发了对经济衰退的担忧，使货币对的比价跌至 1:1。现在，一些市场观察家认为，今年回归平价几乎不可避免。原因如下：【原文：Since the euro came into existence in 1999, the currency has traded at equal value to the US dollar only a handful of times. The last instance was in 2022, after Russia’s full-scale invasion of Ukraine sparked an energy crisis in Europe and provoked fears of a recession, plunging the currency pair to a 1:1 ratio. Now, some market watchers see a return to parity this year as virtually inevitable. Here’s why:】

item.title: 能源巨头维托尔受雇于嘉能可，瞄准铜矿市场
item.description: 维托尔集团（Vitol Group）聘用了一名前嘉能可（Glencore Plc）交易员来发展铜业务，这家能源贸易巨头正努力进军最受瞩目的金属市场。【原文：Vitol Group has hired a former Glencore Plc trader to develop a copper business, as the energy trading powerhouse seeks to enter the highest-profile metals market.】

item.title: 新加入俄罗斯石油贸易的船只停靠受制裁影响的港口
item.description: 上周末，一艘新加入俄罗斯石油贸易的油轮停靠在太平洋港口科兹米诺（Kozmino），因为在上个月美国实施广泛制裁后，商人们正试图重建中断的供应链。【原文：A tanker new to the Russian oil trade docked at the Pacific port of Kozmino over the weekend, as merchants seek to rebuild disrupted supply chains following broad US sanctions last month.】

item.title: Shein将在电子商务打击下接受欧盟消费者法律调查
item.description: 由中国人创办的大型在线市场 Shein 面临着潜在的罚款，欧盟即将对其销售非法产品是否符合消费者法律展开调查。【原文：The Chinese-founded massive online marketplace Shein faces potential fines with the European Union imminently set to open a probe into its compliance with consumer laws over the sale of illegal products.】

item.title: 泰森上调盈利展望，鸡肉带动业绩强劲增长
item.description: 泰森食品公司（Tyson Foods Inc.【原文：Tyson Foods Inc.’s quarterly earnings beat even the highest of analyst estimates as stronger chicken profits helped offset losses in its beef business, prompting the company to raise its 2025 profit estimate.】

item.title: 亿万富翁索洛沃说，波兰需要彻底的能源变革来保持竞争力
item.description: 亿万富翁米哈尔-索洛沃（Michal Solowow）表示，波兰需要迅速整修其昂贵的电力系统，因为在吸引新投资者方面，波兰有可能失去竞争优势。【原文：Poland needs to rapidly overhaul its costly power system as the country risks losing a competitive edge in terms of luring new investors, according to billionaire Michal Solowow.】

item.title: 英国银行业监管机构调查巴克莱银行 IT 故障事件
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，英国监管机构正在与巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）密切接触，因为一个信息技术问题导致数千名客户的账户被锁定数日。【原文：UK regulators are in close contact with Barclays Plc after a IT problem left thousands of customers locked out of their accounts for several days, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 远洋集团获英国法院批准推进债务计划
item.description: 中国违约建筑商远洋集团控股有限公司（Sino-Ocean Group Holding Ltd.）提出的债务重组计划周一获得了伦敦法官的批准，尽管一些债券持有人对该计划的条款提出了质疑。【原文：The debt restructuring plan brought by the defaulted Chinese builder Sino-Ocean Group Holding Ltd. was approved by a London judge on Monday, despite several bondholders challenging its terms.】

item.title: TikTok 政治回旋镖让用户感到不安

item.title: 瑞士监察机构就 Benko 案加大对瑞士宝盛的打击力度
item.description: 瑞士金融监管机构 Finma 表示，已启动针对瑞士宝盛集团有限公司（Julius Baer Group Ltd.）的执法程序，加大对该银行与 Signa 房地产帝国倒闭有关的风险失误的打击力度。【原文：Swiss financial regulator Finma said it had opened an enforcement procedure against Julius Baer Group Ltd., stepping up action against the bank over risk failures linked to the collapse of the Signa real estate empire.】
